sqlMap.select:
select t1.branchcode, (select branchname from ba_branchmst where branchcode = t1.branchcode) as branchname, t1.deptcode, (select deptname from ba_deptmst where branchcode = t1.branchcode and deptcode = t1.deptcode) as deptname, (select dcodename from sy_ccodedtl where ccode = '004' and dcode = t1.duty) as duty, t1.insacode, t1.kname, t1.recoid, (select kname from hr_insamst where insacode = t1.recoid) as reconame, t1.joindate, t1.mobileno, t1.juminid, (case t1.birthdaygubun when 'S' then '양력' when 'M' then '음력' end) as birthdaygubun, t2.acctowner, t2.bankid, (select bankname from sy_bankmst where bankcode = t2.bankid) bankname, t2.acctno, t2.payername, t2.payerid, t1.address from hr_insamst t1, hr_taxpayeritem t2 where 1=1 and t1.insacode = t2.insacode
and t1.joindate >= #S_JOINDATE#
and t1.branchcode = #S_BRANCHCODE#
and t1.deptcode = #S_DEPTCODE#
and t1.retiredate is null order by t1.joindate asc

select (select branchname from ba_branchmst where branchcode = t1.branchcode) as o_branchname, t1.joindate as o_joindate, t1.retiredate as o_retiredate, (case t1.employgubun when 'R' then '정규' when 'F' then '프리' end) as o_employgubun from hr_insamst t1 where 1=1
and t1.insacode = #INSACODE#
and t1.retiredate is not null order by t1.joindate asc
